name: Beat Era
description:
Despite it being called "Beat Era", the game has no sound (ironically). Just imagine there is sound :)

The game has a mobile game aesthetic, 3 difficulties and SKINS, yes SKINS.

Use the W,A,S,D keys to move the character, Escape to pause the game.

Game made by myself and a friend : PxGluz (me)(done the art and a little coding) and MeHigh (made most of the programming).
